Ambush.name: Ambush
Ambush.description: The user cloaks themself in shadows and pounces on the opponent.

GreaterBlink.name: Greater Blink
GreaterBlink.description: The user slams into the opponent after a blink.

Nightfall.name: Nightfall
Nightfall.description: A very strong magical spell that causes a terrible mist to fall upon the arena.

Rest.name: Rest
Rest.description: The user rests to regain energy.

ShadowBreath.name: Shadow Breath
ShadowBreath.description: A breath attack full of malicious power.

TimeFlash.name: Time Flash
TimeFlash.description: A spell that ages the opponent.

TimeWarp.name: Time Warp
TimeWarp.description: The user speeds up, increasing agility and speed.

TranquilBurst.name: Tranquil Burst
TranquilBurst.description: The user fires off a burst of life energy.
